columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource ID.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the application gateway. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Failed'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: enable_fips
columns.description: Whether FIPS is enabled on the application gateway.

columns.name: enable_http2
columns.description: Whether HTTP2 is enabled on the application gateway.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: force_firewall_policy_association
columns.description: If true, associates a firewall policy with an application gateway regardless whether the policy differs from the WAF configuration.

columns.name: operational_state
columns.description: Operational state of the application gateway. Possible values include: 'Stopped', 'Starting', 'Running', 'Stopping'.

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resource GUID property of the application gateway.

columns.name: authentication_certificates
columns.description: Authentication certificates of the application gateway.

columns.name: autoscale_configuration
columns.description: Autoscale Configuration of the application gateway.

columns.name: backend_address_pools
columns.description: Backend address pool of the application gateway.

columns.name: backend_http_settings_collection
columns.description: Backend http settings of the application gateway.

columns.name: custom_error_configurations
columns.description: Custom error configurations of the application gateway.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the application gateway.

columns.name: firewall_policy
columns.description: Reference to the FirewallPolicy resource.

columns.name: frontend_ip_configurations
columns.description: Frontend IP addresses of the application gateway.

columns.name: frontend_ports
columns.description: Frontend ports of the application gateway.

columns.name: gateway_ip_configurations
columns.description: Subnets of the application gateway.

columns.name: http_listeners
columns.description: Http listeners of the application gateway.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the application gateway, if configured.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: Private endpoint connections on application gateway.

columns.name: private_link_configurations
columns.description: PrivateLink configurations on application gateway.

columns.name: probes
columns.description: Probes of the application gateway.

columns.name: redirect_configurations
columns.description: Redirect configurations of the application gateway.

columns.name: request_routing_rules
columns.description: Request routing rules of the application gateway.

columns.name: rewrite_rule_sets
columns.description: Rewrite rules for the application gateway.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: SKU of the application gateway.

columns.name: ssl_certificates
columns.description: SSL certificates of the application gateway.

columns.name: ssl_policy
columns.description: SSL policy of the application gateway.

columns.name: ssl_profiles
columns.description: SSL profiles of the application gateway.

columns.name: trusted_client_certificates
columns.description: Trusted client certificates of the application gateway.

columns.name: trusted_root_certificates
columns.description: Trusted root certificates of the application gateway.

columns.name: url_path_maps
columns.description: URL path map of the application gateway.

columns.name: web_application_firewall_configuration
columns.description: Web application firewall configuration of the application gateway.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
